response.original_title: NBC's Milan Cortina Winter Olympics Opening Ceremony
response.overview: NBC's coverage of the 2026 Winter Olympics opening ceremony in Milan and Cortina d'Ampezzo. Experience the world's biggest event live on the big screen! Itâ€™s NBC's broadcast of the Opening Ceremony of the Milan Cortina Winter Olympics. Witness a ceremony with classic Italian splendor and style, a star-studded cast of performers, and a spectacular parade of athletes leading to the introduction of Team USA.
